thread.title: Vampire Diaries Mega Buzz: Don't Expect a Bonnie-Damon Hookup Soon
thread.title_full: Vampire Diaries Mega Buzz: Don't Expect a Bonnie-Damon Hookup Soon

author: TV Guide
title: Vampire Diaries Mega Buzz: Don't Expect a Bonnie-Damon Hookup Soon
text: Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 8:28 AM Updated at 11:34 AM Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 8:28 AM Updated at 11:34 AM Any fans hoping to see a romantic pairing between Damon and Bonnie on The Vampire Diaries shouldn't hold their breath. Unable to see the love of his life until his best friend dies, Damon ( Ian Somerhalder ) is in quite the dark place when the CW drama returns - and unfortunately, he's taking it out on Bonnie ( Kat Graham ). Bonnie stands by Damon, chaperoning his drunken European tour with Alaric and even brushing off Damon's jokes about her dying so he could see Elena. But when Damon nearly lets Bonnie get hit by a car, she realizes that their friendship might not be able to survive Damon's resentment. Catch up on all this week's Mega Buzz All that said, there may still be some hope. When they returns home to find the Heretics running the place, Damon must decide once and for all whether he can get over his bitterness and unite with Bonnie against this new threat. (And he totally has to, right?) Crave scoop on your favorite TV shows? E-mail questions to mega_scoop@tvguide.com or drop us a line at Twitter.com/TVGuide (Full Disclosure: TVGuide.com is owned by CBS, one of The CW's parent companies.) Other Links From TVGuide.com
